name: Conjurer
description: Gain fire aura when an ally picks up a conjured weapon.

facts.description: Enveloped in a fiery shield that burns foes, grants might each time you are struck (1-second cooldown per attacker).

traited_facts.description: Enveloped in a fiery shield that burns foes, grants might each time you are struck (1-second cooldown per attacker).
